content: *do you need peace and comfort after the busy holiday season * then this stitch along featuring my new calming comfort afghan will be the one for you welcome to this year s edition of our 2021 boxing day stitch along i m super excited to be hosting the event for the 2nd year in a row the project will begin on december 26 2021 and continue for the following 3 weeks you ll want to choose your favourite yarns to be ready to crochet with us once the free pattern is released each week
